text: Park Hae-soo (; born November 21, 1981) is an actor from South Korea. He is popular for his roles in the television series Prison Playbook (2017â€“2018) and Squid Game (2021). == Career == Park Hae-soo impressed fans with his lead role in the drama series Prison Playbook in 2017. This role earned him Best New Actor at The Seoul Awards. Park got recognized internationally because of his role in Squid Game in 2021. He gained over 800,000 Instagram followers in a single day. == References == Category:Living people Category:Actors from Seoul Category:1981 births Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean television actors
title: Park Hae-soo
